text:
e="preserve">Brent Carver (November 17, 1951 – August 4, 2020) was a Canadian actor. He was best known for his roles on Broadway in "Parade" as Leo Frank and "Kiss of the Spider Woman" as Molina. He won the Tony Award for Best Leading Actor in a Musical in 1993.
Carver was born in Cranbrook, British Columbia. He died on August 4, 2020 at the age of 68 at home in Cranbrook.

annotations.surface_form: Best Leading Actor in a Musical
